author: The Film Theorists
description:
Who knew cookies could save your life? In the Matrix, we see Neo visiting The Oracle who in turn, offers him a cookie. Because The Matrix takes place in a computer simulation, the cookies she offers him aren’t actually real cookies, but they might have a larger meaning than just being an endearing sweet treat!
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee & Bob Chipman
Editor: AbsolutePixel
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman
